ygData.subject: Brell Serilis
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, It seems there is a lot of interest in having the guild be on Brell Serilis.  Not everyone agrees, but the majority is in favor, so lets go ahead
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

It seems there is a lot of interest in having the guild be on Brell
Serilis. Not everyone agrees, but the majority is in favor, so lets go
ahead with it.

For those of you who wish an official city, I'd like to suggest
Kelethin/Felwithe.

In order to create the guild, I need at least nine people to join me in
the EQ chat tonight to go through the automated guild creation process.
I'll arbitrarily ask that people show up at 10:30 EST in the Brell
Serilis chat room. I'll then create a "Sisters of Erollisi" chat room
which we will move to, and the automated guild creation process will
begin. I will then add players within the game as you send me tells.

I have a 6th level high-elf enchanter on Brell named Luna.

- Christina
